name: cannlytics
description: Cannlytics includes a LIMS, a console, documentation, a website, and vast amount of tools for cannabis analytics.

scripts.ai:deploy-cannabis-data-daily: cd ./tools/data/state_data/get_cannabis_data_daily & gcloud functions deploy get_cannabis_data_daily --entry-point get_cannabis_data_daily --runtime python39 --trigger-topic get_cannabis_data_daily --memory 1024MB --timeout 300 --env-vars-file env.yaml & cd ../../../../
scripts.console:serve: cd console & webpack serve --env development & cd ../
scripts.console:container: npm run console:collectstatic & gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/cannlytics/cannlytics-console ./console/DockerFile
scripts.console:cloud: gcloud run deploy cannlytics-console --image gcr.io/cannlytics/cannlytics-console --set-env-vars SETTINGS_NAME=cannlytics_platform_settings --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --platform managed --memory 2Gi --cpu 2 --min-instances 1
scripts.console:publish: npm run console:build & npm run console:container & npm run console:cloud & npm run console:deploy
scripts.website:serve: cd website & webpack serve --env development & cd ../
scripts.website:container: npm run website:collectstatic --noinput & gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/cannlytics/cannlytics-website
scripts.website:cloud: gcloud run deploy cannlytics-website --image gcr.io/cannlytics/cannlytics-website --set-env-vars SETTINGS_NAME=cannlytics_website_settings --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --platform managed --memory 2Gi --cpu 2 --min-instances 1
scripts.website:publish: npm run website:build & npm run website:container & npm run website:cloud && npm run website:deploy
